original_text: And the Lord was angry with Solomon, because his heart had turned away from the Lord, the God of Israel, who had appeared to him twice
korean_text: 솔로몬이 마음을 돌려 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와를 떠나므로 여호와께서 그에게 진노하시니라 여호와께서 일찍이 두 번이나 그에게 나타나시고

sentences.original_text: And the Lord was angry with Solomon
because his heart had turned away from the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그의 마음이 주님에게서 떠났기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: who had appeared to him twice
